"Hey. You alright, Sara?": "...This is unexpected. But it saves me the effort."
"Well, ahaha... It's the answer I came to. I had something I needed to protect."
"...You idiot! Why would you protect me?!"
"I know it's illogical. But my body moved before I had time to think..."
"Really now, even I'm getting too human... So, I think I'll take a rest, like humans do."
